'''''Secret of Seelie and the Star-Lit Sky''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Memories of the Heart]]''.

To complete this achievement, the player needs to obtain the "The Price to Pay and Its Returns" ending in {{Quest|One Final Step}}.
